pr_title: Fix NXP-29618 rate limit exceed gcp

timeline.message: NXP-29618: Check blob presence before uploading it
NXP-29618: Check blob presence before uploading it

timeline.bodyText: I guess that bucket.get(key) only gets metadata and does not get the full blob stream, right?
timeline.author: efge

replies.bodyText: Indeed, the blob content is retrieved through the Blob#downloadTo method (or reader). I will add  a comment to state that.
replies.author: kevinleturc
